string.text: Ever had my famous Hawaiian BBQ? Ok, it's just shashlik. But we need fuel to cook and to keep the lights on around here, so if you have any gas, I'll make good use of it.

Got any radio parts or old radios? I like to tinker with them in my spare time. Plus, having some working communications is really handy given how big this area is. I'll give you some things from my stock in exchange.

I stopped drinking a while ago, but I still have a huge stash of alcohol from my days in Zaton. I had this one customer who, while he ultimately snapped me out of my addiction, ensured I had plenty of bottles. Can you find me something else to drink?

Do you know my colleague Sakharov? He started a rather successful program to exchange medical supplies for mutant parts. We just had our shipment today, so I'm happy to announce an extension of the program in Jupiter.
